abstract_summ: The average NO(2) column drop over all Chinese cities amounts to ‐40% relative to the same period in 2019, and reaches up to a factor of ~2 at heavily hit cities, e.g. Wuhan, Jinan, while the decreases in Western Europe and the U.S. are also significant . Iran is also strongly affected by the disease, but the observations do not show evidence of lower emissions .
